document.full_text: in a quest to satisfy a curiosity that dates to high school, r.a. dickey plans to lead a small group up the tallest free-standing mountain in the world, mount kilimanjaro.
document.title: mets' dickey has visions of hurling knuckleballs from on high
lines_and_colors: in a quest to satisfy a curiosity that dates to high school, r.a. dickey plans to lead a small group up the tallest free-standing mountain in the world, mount kilimanjaro.
